name: Flat white
description: If you have a coffee machine, make the best use of it with our easy flat white recipe. This trendy beverage has earned its spot at the breakfast table

name: Cappuccino
description: Make your favourite morning coffee from scratch – it's easy with the right equipment. We love a creamy cappuccino topped with a sprinkling of cocoa powder

name: Latte
description: Dust off that coffee machine and learn a few barista skills to make a creamy latte. Our easy recipe takes breakfast, or brunch, to the next level

name: Dalgona coffee
description: Our easy whipped coffee recipe is simple enough to make at home. This frothy drink, known as dalgona coffee, might just be your new favourite caffeine kick

name: Iced caramel macchiato
description: Take your coffee game up a notch this summer with our iced caramel macchiato – it's made with espresso, milk, vanilla syrup and caramel sauce

name: Iced latte
description: Cool off with a refreshing iced latte. This simple drink only needs a handful of ingredients and is perfect for a hot weather caffeine kick

name: Macchiato
description: Put your coffee machine to work and brew an easy macchiato. Ideal for breakfast, brunch or whenever you need a pick-me-up

name: Mocha
description: If you have a coffee machine, treat yourself to a comforting, chocolatey mocha. You don't need to be a trained barista with our easy recipe

name: Iced mocha
description: Combine the richness of chocolate milk with a hit of espresso and a whipped cream topping to make a moreish iced mocha – it's like a dessert in a glass

name: Coffee cake
description: Whip up a classic coffee cake with ease. You can freeze the sponges if you want to save time later on. Ideal for a bake sale, birthday party or coffee morning

name: Café au lait
description: For a French twist on your morning cup, try this recipe using equal parts coffee and milk. It’s typically made with dark roasted coffee

name: Coffee & walnut flapjacks
description: Sticky and syrupy, these grown-up flapjacks will satisfy your cravings with a coffee and walnut twist that's sure to please

name: Coffee granita
description: Wow your party guests with this easy, light dessert and after-dinner coffee all rolled into one. It's a lovely end to any meal and a cooling treat in summer

name: Coffee ice cream terrine
description: Try this twist on a favourite childhood ice-cream dessert with coffee and chocolate layers. Made with just five ingredients, it's a great make-ahead pud

name: Espresso old fashioned
description: Try this twist on an old fashioned cocktail, with a double shot of espresso accompanying the classic flavours of bourbon and Angostura bitters

name: Cortado
description: Made up of equal parts espresso and steamed milk, this coffee is traditionally served in a Gibraltar glass (and sometimes called Gibraltar coffee)

name: Espresso mud cakes, chocolate syrup & ice cream
description: To finish your meal try this take on coffee and dessert, and if you have any coffee liqueur in the back of the drinks cabinet, put a splash in the syrup

name: Espresso martini
description: Learn how to make this classic coffee cocktail. Our easy recipe uses freshly brewed espresso, a dash of coffee liqueur and a simple sugar syrup.

name: Coffee & walnut cake
description: The classic combo is made extra sumptuous with mascarpone frosting - a traditional sponge for cake sales and parties

name: How to make cold brew coffee
description: High in caffeine, this iced cold brew coffee will keep you cool on hot days while giving you the boost you need. Enjoy an ultra-refreshing kick-start to your day

name: Iced coffee
description: Discover how to make iced coffee at home. With this simple recipe, you can get a cooling caffeine fix with no fuss. Try it with a shot of maple syrup

name: Pumpkin spice latte
description: Get cosy with a pumpkin spice latte, perfect for cold autumn and winter nights. With ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg and pumpkin flavours, it's a real treat

name: Coffee semifreddo
description: This elegant dessert is easy to slice straight from the freezer

name: Coffee cocktails
description: The perfect finish for a successful dinner party
